XIII.i.1.A.1.c
.
Veteran Eligibility
for DEA Purposes
For there to be basic eligibility to DEA based on the service of a Veteran, there must be
either
an other than dishonorable discharge,
or
death in service.
In addition there must be
any
of the following:
permanent and total (P&T) service-connected (SC) disability
P&T SC disability on the date of the Veteran’s death, or
death resulting from an SC disability.
Note
:  Disability or death under
38 U.S.C. 1151
does
not
establish eligibility.
Reference
:  For more information on P&T evaluations, see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, 3.D.4
.
